Html:
HI -

I am looking to build a 64 bit version of Ncalc -
I downloaded the source, and there is a reference to Antlr.3.

One thing I find odd about this - when I run Ncalc and reference the pre-built dll, it doesn't seem to need Antlr to run, but works fine. The source clearly references this, and I definately dont see any Antlr dll loaded in the modules list -

What exactly is happening here with Antlr?

Thanks
